chain.name: A Lesson On Job Advancement
procedures: Talk to Olaf in Lith Harbor.

Correctly answer the questions asked by him.
QUESTIONS:
The level required to advance as a warrior, thief or bowman.
The level required to advance as a magician.
The place to advance for certain jobs.
The level required to advance as a warrior, thief or bowman.
The level required to advance as a magician.
The place to advance for certain jobs.

chain.name: The Path of Magician (Magician Only)
procedures: Talk to Olaf in Lith Harbor.
Head over to Ellinia and talk to Grendel the Really Old.

chain.name: The Path of Thief (Thief Only)
procedures: Talk to Olaf in Lith Harbor.
Head over to Kerning City and talk to Dark Lord.

name: The Wandering Alchemist Eurek's New Skill

chain.name: The Wandering Alchemist Eurek's New Skill
procedures: Talk to Eurek the Alchemist in Sleepywood.
Purchase 1 Scroll for Bottomwear for DEF 100%.
Purchase 1 Scroll for Helmet for DEF 100%.
Purchase 1 Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 100%.
Purchase 1 Scroll for Topwear for DEF 100%.
Obtain 1 Red Whip.
Pay Eurek the Alchemist 1,000,000 mesos to complete the quest.
Return to him after you have collected the items.

itemsNeeded.name: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 100%

chain.name: Enjoy the Entitlement!
procedures: Find Captain Al and talk to him.
Save up 2,000 Rep then use Entitlement to spend it down below 500.
Talk to Captain Al again.

chain.name: Captain Al, Who Are You?
procedures: Find Captain Al and talk to him.
Become a member of a Family.
Talk to Captain Al again.

chain.name: Find a Junior!
procedures: Find Captain Al and talk to him.
Add at least one Junior.
Return to Captain Al and talk to him.

chain.name: The Path of Bowman (Bowman Only)
procedures: Talk to Olaf in Lith Harbor.
Head over to Victoria Road: Henesys Park and talk to Athena Pierce.

chain.name: The Path of Warrior (Warrior Only)
procedures: Talk to Olaf in Lith Harbor.
Head over to Perion and talk to Dances with Balrog.

chain.name: The Road of Pirate (Pirate Only)
procedures: Talk to Olaf in Lith Harbor.
Head over to Nautilus Port and talk to Kyrin.

chain.name: The Prince Request
procedures: Talk to Sharyl in The Nautilus: Bottom Floor - Hallway.
Obtain 1 Mana Elixir.
Return to Sharyl after you have obtained the item.

chain.name: Shining Stone
procedures: After talking to Sharyl, go to The Nautilus: Generator Room.
Head to the bottom of the room and click on the Shiny Stone.
Return to Sharyl after you have completed the task.

name: I Need To Find My Daughter

chain.name: I Need To Find My Daughter 1
procedures: Talk to Bruce in Henesys.  You will obtain 1 Toy Sword.
Bring that item to Ayan in Perion.

chain.name: I Need To Find My Daughter 2
procedures: Bring the obtained item to Henesys and give it to Bruce.

chain.name: I'm Bored 2
procedures: Hunt for 40 Squishy Liquid.
Hunt for 40 Tree Branch.
Return to Icarus after you have collected all the items and give it to him.

chain.name: The Half-Written Letter
procedures: Double click on the garbage can which is located near Muirhat in The Nautilus: Top Floor - Hallway.
Once you have obtained 1 Crumpled Paper, talk to Muirhat.
Head over to Henesys and talk to Athena Pierce.

chain.name: Athena Pierce's Gift
procedures: Talk to Athena Pierce in Henesys and you will obtain 1 Old Orgel.
Go back to The Nautilus: Top Floor - Hallway and give the obtained item to Kyrin.

chain.name: Fanzy the Mysterious Cat
procedures: Talk to Nella in Kerning City.
You will initiate the next quest, Fanzy the Amusing Cat.

chain.name: Fanzy the Amusing Cat
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: The Forest North of Ellinia
rewards: You will also be rewarded 15 pet closeness.
procedures: Search for Fanzy at Victoria Road: The Forest North of Ellinia.
Hunt for 1 Red Ball of Yarn from Slime.
Go back to Fanzy once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Sea Firefly 2
procedures: Talk to Muse in Aquarium: Zoo and you will obtain 1 Magic Flask (Filled).
Go back to The Nautilus: Bottom Floor - Hallway and give the obtained item to Sharyl.

chain.name: Sea Firefly 1
procedures: Talk to Sharyl in The Nautilus: Bottom Floor - Hallway and you will obtain 1 Magic Flask (Empty).
Head over to Aquarium: Zoo and give the obtained item to Muse.

chain.name: The Large Pearl
procedures: Talk to Sharyl in The Nautilus: Bottom Floor - Hallway.
Go to the bottom of the map in The Nautilus: Generator Room.
Hit the oyster as shown in the image above until you have obtained 1 Large Pearl.
Head over to The Nautilus: Top Floor - Hallway and give the obtained item to Muirhat.

chain.name: The Stump Horror Story
procedures: Talk to Ayan in Perion.
Hunt and kill 50 Stump.
Return to Perion and talk to Ayan.

name: I Need Help On My Homework!

chain.name: I Need Help On My Homework!
procedures: Talk to Wing the Fairy in Ellinia.
Hunt for 10 Slime's Bubble.
Hunt for 30 Tree Branch.
Hunt for 30 Squishy Liquid.
Once you have obtained the items, return to Wing the Fairy and give them to him.

name: The Reason Behind the Mushroom Studies

chain.name: The Reason Behind the Mushroom Studies
procedures: Talk to Bruce in Henesys.
Hunt for 40 Orange Mushroom Cap.
Hunt for 10 Mushroom Spore.
Return to Bruce and give him all the collected items.

name: A Mysterious Entity On-Board The Nautilus

chain.name: A Mysterious Entity On-Board The Nautilus
procedures: Talk to Baine in The Nautilus: Bottom Floor - Hallway.
Head out to Victoria Road: Nautilus Harbor and talk to Bart.

name: A Mysterious Presence On-Board The Nautilus

chain.name: A Mysterious Presence On-Board The Nautilus
procedures: Talk to Bart in Victoria Road: Nautilus Harbor and you will obtain 1 Daily Log.
Go to The Nautilus: Bottom Floor - Hallway and talk to Baine.

chain.name: The Truth Behind the Black Shadow
procedures: Talk to Baine in The Nautilus: Bottom Floor - Hallway.
Kill 20 Red Snail.
Kill 20 Pig.
Hunt for 1 Black Magician's Token from Red Snail or Pig.
Return to Baine once you have completed the tasks.

chain.name: Report to Muirhat
procedures: Talk to Baine in The Nautilus: Bottom Floor - Hallway. You will obtain 1 Confidential Report.
Look for Muirhat in The Nautilus: Top Floor - Hallway and talk to him.

chain.name: Disciples of the Black Magician
procedures: Talk to Muirhat in The Nautilus: Top Floor - Hallway.
Talk to him again and select: "Please send me to where the Black Magician's Subordinate is hiding."
Kill the Pig in the map until a Black Magician's Subordinate appears (this one doesn't make a sound when hit). Defeat it.
Return to Muirhat and talk to him once you have completed the tasks.

chain.name: Fixing Blackbull's House
procedures: Talk Blackbull in Perion.
Hunt 30 Tree Branch from Stump.
Hunt 50 Firewood from Axe Stump or Dark Axe Stump.
Talk to Blackbull again.

chain.name: Beauty or Beast
procedures: Talk to Claudia in Amoria.
Hunt for 25 Squishy Liquid.
Return to Claudia after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Playing Around in Ninja Town             (Level 30 and above)
rewards: Dark Scroll for Shoes for Jump 30% x 1
procedures: Talk to Shururu at Zipangu: Outside Ninja Castle.
Hunt for 30 Genin Doll from Genin.
Return and talk to Shururu.

chain.name: Around Lith Harbor             (Level 8 and above)
procedures: Talk to Olaf at Lith Harbor.
Hunt Ribbon Pig for 1 Pig's Head and 20 Pig's Ribbon.
Return and talk to Olaf.

chain.name: Relaxing at the Mushroom Shrine             (Level 20 and above)
procedures: Talk to Kino Konoko at Zipangu: Mushroom Shrine.
Hunt for 2 Maple Special Bento from Blue Mushroom.
Return and talk to Kino Konoko.

name: Tigun the Guard at the Palace

chain.name: Tigun the Guard at the Palace
rewards: This quest is repeatable if you have dropped the Palace Pass.
procedures: Talk to Tigun in Ariant: Ariant Castle.
Talk to him once again to complete the quest.

name: Learning About the Culture of Ariant

chain.name: Learning About the Culture of Ariant
procedures: Talk to Byron in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Head over to Ariant: Ariant Castle and talk to the Court Oasis (double click on the water) as shown in the image below.
Go back to Byron and talk to him.

chain.name: Disgruntled Roly-Poly Worker
procedures: Talk to Roly-Poly 10 at Ludibrium: Eos Tower 3rd Floor.
Kill 20 Black Ratz.
Hunt for 5 Hard Walnut.
Return and talk to Roly-Poly 10.
